titles.title: 183 Come Lord And Tarry Not (familiar tune)

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Come Lord and tarry not
Bring the long looked for day
O why these years of waiting here
These ages of decay

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Come for Thy saints still wait
Daily ascends the sigh
Worn out with these
Long years of ill
These ages of delay

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
Come for creation groans
Impatient of Thy stay
Worn out with these long years of ill
These ages of delay

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
Come for the good are few
They lift the voice in vain
Faith waxes fainter on the earth
And love is on the wane

verse.name: v5
verse.lines:
Come for the truth is weak
And error pours abroad
Its subtle poison o'er the earth
An earth that hates her God

verse.name: v6
verse.lines:
Come for love waxes cold
Its steps are faint and slow
Faith now is lost in unbelief
Hope's lamp burns dim and low

verse.name: v7
verse.lines:
Come for the corn is ripe
Put in Thy sickle now
Reap the great harvest of the earth
Sower and reaper Thou

verse.name: v8
verse.lines:
Come and make all things new
Build up this ruined earth
Restore our faded Paradise
Creation's second birth

verse.name: v9
verse.lines:
Come and begin Thy reign
Of everlasting peace
Come take the kingdom to Thyself
Great King of Righteousness
